bossDialog: (Smashing its way out of the ground, the Forsaken smiles wickedly at you as other creatures appear to aid it in battle!)
(The Forsaken starts crawling along the floor backwards at you, its head twisted all the way around to stare at you. You quickly have your creatures intercept!)

master.dialog: Forsaken are unimaginably powerful creatures, but such strength comes at a cost. They're cursed, you see, and this curse causes their bodies to decompose in the midst of battle. A bit unfortunate, but the tradeoff is well worth it. Let me show you how it's done!
master.name: Savine

name: Forsaken
